sentences.en: Business flourished and within six months they were earning 18,000 roubles a day.
sentences.cn: 生意兴隆，6个月中他们每天挣18000卢布。
作物在肥沃的土壤中长得茂盛.

sentences.en: He flourished the glass to emphasize the point.
sentences.cn: 他挥舞着杯子来强调这一点。

sentences.en: He scrawled his name across the bill, underlining it with a showy flourish.
sentences.cn: 他在账单上潦草地签上自己的名字，并在名字下面画了一条花体线。

sentences.en: He showed us his new design with much flourish.
sentences.cn: 他炫耀地向我们展示他的新设计.

sentences.en: He took his cap from under his arm with a flourish and pulled it low over his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他挥手从腋下取出帽子，拉低帽檐盖住眼睛。

sentences.en: He took his peaked cap from under his arm with a flourish and pulled it low over his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他一下子把尖顶帽从胳膊下面掏出来戴在头上，然后把帽檐拉低盖住眼睛。

sentences.en: He underlined his signature with a little flourish.
sentences.cn: 他挥笔在签名下画了一条线.

sentences.en: If left unchecked, weeds will flourish.
sentences.cn: 如果不加以遏制，杂草就会疯长。

sentences.en: It's one thing to flourish and another to fight.
sentences.cn: 舞剑是一回事,战斗是另一回事.

sentences.en: Keep the soil moist. That way, the seedling will flourish.
sentences.cn: 保持土壤湿润，那样幼苗就能茁壮成长。

sentences.en: Racism and crime still flourish in the ghetto.
sentences.cn: 城市贫民区的种族主义和犯罪仍然十分猖獗。

sentences.en: She rode by with a flourish of her whip.
She tended to finish dancing with a flourish.
sentences.cn: 她往往以夸张的姿势结束舞蹈。

sentences.en: The economy is booming and small businesses are flourishing.
sentences.cn: 经济繁荣，小企业蒸蒸日上。

sentences.en: The illegal trade in animal products continues to flourish.
sentences.cn: 野生动物制品的非法交易仍旧猖獗。

sentences.en: We are all born leaders; we just need the right circumstances in which to flourish.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人天生都具备领导者的素质；我们只是需要适当的环境来培养这种素质。

sentences.en: When the root is firm , the branches flourish.
With a flourish of their spears , the two men started sparring with each other.
sentences.cn: 两人拿长枪一比试,便打了起来.
